items.content_html: InStock is a lightweight and efficient web-based inventory management application designed for small and medium businesses, retail stores, supermarkets, and local vendors. This system helps users track inventory in real-time, manage stock levels, and receive low-stock alerts to avoid shortages or overstocking.
items.title: shikha04-glitch/Shikha_CSE3_InStock: InStock is a lightweight and efficient web-based inventory management application designed for small and medium businesses, retail stores, supermarkets, and local vendors. This system helps users track inventory in real-time, manage stock levels, and receive low-stock alerts to avoid shortages or overstocking.

items.content_html: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and share them with others.
items.title: kunalcoder45/Cravid_web: Cravid is a simple, elegant, and lightweight wallpaper application built using React Native. It allows users to browse and download high-quality wallpapers directly to their devices. With a smooth and intuitive user interface, users can easily set their favorite images as wallpapers and share them with others.
